name: Captain Corn's Escape
description:
Created for Ludum Dare 48

https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/48/captain-corns-escape

Help captain corn leave the system unharmed in this 2d platformer.

Keyboard Controls:

  • WASD/Arrow Keys - Move
  • Space - Jump

Gamepad Controls:

  • Left stick - Move
  • A Button (XBOX Controller) - Jump

Created by

  • Lukas Konieczny
  • Andreas Korge
